alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:59PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southeastern Palm Beach Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 159 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hamptons At Boca Raton, or near Boca Raton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Boca Raton, Deerfield Beach, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Coconut Creek, Parkland, Mission Bay, Boca Pointe, Boca Del Mar, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Whisper Walk, Godfrey Road, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Loxahatchee NWR, Fau South Campus, Boca West, Hillsboro Pines and Villages Of Oriole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
